name: fix-your-city
description: ### *Built by the Mad Hackers for the [NYC Developer Week Hackathon](http://www.developerweek.com/NYC/hackathon/)* ___ ## Fix Your City brings denizens of a city together with the infrastructure managers ### Users can: * Report Infrastructure Problems they see in their daily lives * Add photographs and geotagging * Add descriptions * Comment on incidents other users have uploaded
author: The Mad Hackers of NYC
